channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I have a great mortgage rate’: I need $80K to buy my husband out of our home. Do I raid my $180K Roth IRA?
My late husband’s employer is forcing me to take 10% 401(k) distributions. Help!
item.description: “A company representative said the account needed to be emptied within a 10-year period.”

item.title: Stock buybacks are surging. Here’s why it matters to your portfolio.
item.description: This year’s record-setting pace of share buybacks is bearish.

item.title: A voice breaking from the Fed ranks just heightened her push for cutting interest rates fast

item.title: ‘Things are getting tougher’: I’m struggling with $145,000 in debt. Should I refinance my 3.5% mortgage?
item.description: “I’m in my upper 40s and have $300,000 in my 401(k).”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
